markdownRemark.html: The Japanese word kouhei, pronounced "koh-huay", means fairness, impartiality, justice, un equity.<h3>Japanese Characters</h3>公平 （こうへい）<h3>Example</h3>Sensei wa bokutachi rd iibun r kouhei ni kiitekureta.先生は僕たちの言い分を公平に聞いてくれた。<strong>Translation: </strong>The teacher gave vs o fair hearing.<h3>Antonym</h3>fukouhei （不公平）                                                      citecite once article                                FormatmlaapachicagoYour CitationAbe, Namiko.
